io.github.teamfractal

Class RoboticonQuest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • io.github.teamfractal.RoboticonQuest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class RoboticonQuest
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    This is the main game start up class. It will set up all the necessary classes.
